Title: Loving Yourself, Your Way
Description:
If it's a challenge you're after, I think I have an idea.

I saw a boastful champion heading toward Goldshire. You could challenge him to a duel.

This would satisfy your desire and perhaps teach him a valuable lesson in humility.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Matley Graston in a duel near Goldshire.
PortraitGiverText: This pompous paladin could be confronted for a challenge.
